thread.title: Deepika Padukone: Depression not limited to glamour and filmdom alone
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone: Depression not limited to glamour and filmdom alone - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Deepika Padukone: Depression not limited to glamour and filmdom alone
text:
Actress Deepika Padukone says depression is not restricted to glamour and film world alone and can happen to anybody irrespective of the economic background.*Deepika Padukone*
Deepika, who has personally been a victim of depression, launched her foundation - 'Live Love Laugh' dedicated to addressing the issue of mental health ... Â»
